title: The Yorck Project - DIGITALE BIBLIOTHEK (ART, PHOTO, PICTURES)
description:
[IMG]http://i015.radikal.ru/0803/bf/981e6c0557d7.jpg[/IMG]

Directmedia&#039;s sister enterprise, The Yorck Project (based in Yorck road, Berlin), specialises in the publication of CDs or DVDs with extensive picture collections including art, photography and historical illustrations. The software used to display content runs under Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X, with a beta version for Linux also available. In April 2005, Directmedia contributed scans of 10,000 public domain paintings to the Wikimedia Commons project. In 2007 The Yorck Project was renamed to Zenodot Verlagsgesellschaft mbH and started the online digital library Zeno.org in October 2007.
